tool_description: An API to fetch samples and covers of songs by artist name and song title.
name: WhoSampled API
title: WhoSampled API

api_list.name: Get Sampled Tracks
api_list.description: Get sampled tracks of a given artist's track.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com/Melba-Moore/Pick-Me-Up-I%27ll-Dance/sampled"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com/{artistid}/{trackid}/sampled"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cover Tracks
api_list.description: Get tracks that have covered a given artist's track.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com/Tony-Bennett/The-Best-Is-Yet-to-Come/covered"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Sample Tracks
api_list.description: Get samples of a given artist's track.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com/Daft-Punk/Da-Funk/samples"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Related Tracks
api_list.description: Gets all related tracks (sampled tracks, sample tracks, cover tracks, remix tracks.)
api_list.code:

url = "https://whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com/Donna-Summer/Hot-Stuff"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whosampled-api.p.rapidapi.com"
